# Multi-tenancy Implementation

## What is multi-tenancy? and, Possible flows

diagram

- All tenants on Single Domain
- Each tenant on a different sub-domain
  - Handling callbacks through common domain

## Config management using Core

- CRUD operations
- Config structure
- Note on `clientType`

## Frontend

- getConfiguredProviders API

## Backend

- Automatic creation of providers for built-in
- Using Custom providers for multi-tenancy

## Session handling

- Session claims to assert tenant
